entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:23 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:23 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:23 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
